# API Reference

Auto-generated API documentation for the project&#39;s Python modules. These pages are created with Sphinx autosummary + autodoc from the source code in `src/`.

```{note}
If the first build fails due to heavy optional dependencies, configure `autodoc_mock_imports` in `docs/conf.py` to mock those packages during doc generation.
```

```{autosummary}
:toctree: generated
:recursive:

src.agents
src.api
src.connectors
src.dashboard
src.database
src.models
src.orchestration
src.pipelines
src.rag
src.utils
src.validation
src.validators
